players.name: Alice
memory: Charlie: "Bob is suspicious, I think he might be the detective."
Bob: "I will continue to investigate and gather more evidence. I won't reveal my role as the detective, but I'll try to uncover who the remaining villager is."
You: "I saw Diana last night, she seemed fine. I don't have any suspicions about anyone yet."

players.name: Bob
memory: You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Charlie: "Bob is suspicious, I think he might be the detective."
You: "I will continue to investigate and gather more evidence. I won't reveal my role as the detective, but I'll try to uncover who the remaining villager is."
Alice: "I saw Diana last night, she seemed fine. I don't have any suspicions about anyone yet."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Alice, Charlie voted for Alice
